title: Haitians Eating Pets in Springfield, Ohio
summary: During presidential debate, Trump claimed Haitian immigrants were 'eating the dogs' and 'eating the cats' in Springfield, Ohio. City officials confirmed it was completely false. JD Vance admitted he 'created' the story.
keyFacts: September 2024 debate: Trump claimed Haitian immigrants in Springfield, Ohio were 'eating the dogs' and 'eating the cats'
'They're eating the pets of the people that live there'
City officials, police, and local residents confirmed this was completely false
JD Vance admitted he 'created' the story to draw attention to immigration
PolitiFact named it the 2024 'Lie of the Year' - Trump's fourth such award
Led to bomb threats against Springfield schools and hospitals
Trump never retracted the claim and repeated it at rallies
